channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Protected post box graffiti, 31st December
item.description:
The protected post box on the corner of pittville circus road and Hewlett Road has graffiti on it. I have reported this twice to the council but it is still there. The bus stop sign next to it has a similar problem. Nearest proper address is Berkhampstead School.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 169, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in middle of road, 31st December
item.description:
Pot hole near centre of road opposite the stone wall so challenging to avoid it Hit it today and my car is now showing a ‘check the drivetrain’ warning alert
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 31st December
item.description:
Bus driver reporting temp lights stuck on red for some considerable time. Has been on same route all morning & confirmed issue ongoing since start of shift. Some roadusers driving through while lights on red.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
